Content: Major General Nevil Weerasinghe, the General Officer Commanding (GOC) of the 22 Infantry Division in Trincomalee relinquished his office on Sunday (3) to take over a new appointment at the Army Headquarters. A Guard Turnout plus a Guard of Honour saluted the outgoing General Officer Commanding. He inspected the parade and addressed the gathering afterwards in keeping with military traditions. An all rank tea culminated the brief relinquishment. He was 23rd General Officer Commanding of the 22 Infantry Division. All Brigade Commanders, Commanding Officers, Officers and many Other Ranks representing different establishments of the 22 Division attended for the occasion.
